Interface DicomConfigurationManager

  • All Superinterfaces:

extends ExtendedDicomConfiguration, ConfigurationManager
    This interface is for internal use.

    • Method Detail

      • preventDeviceModifications

        void preventDeviceModifications(Device d)
        Remembers a weak reference to the provided device so that any subsequent call to persist or merge for this specific instance is made, an error is logged. This is a safeguard against misusing a singleton injected device and making direct modifications on it. In future, logging an error will be replaced with throwing an exception
        Parameters:
        d -

      • refreshTCGroups

        void refreshTCGroups()
        Triggers a reload of TC groups
